ACKDF.summary: Auckland International Airport Limited provides airport facilities, supporting infrastructure, and aeronautical services in Auckland, New Zealand. The company operates through three segments: Aeronautical, Retail, and Property. The Aeronautical segment offers services that facilitate the movement of aircraft, passengers, and cargo, as well as utility services, which support the airport; and leases space for facilities, such as terminals. The Retail segment provides services to the retailers within the terminals; and car parking facilities for passengers, visitors, and airport staff. The Property segment leases cargo buildings, hangars, and stand-alone investment properties. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Manukau, New Zealand.

AIZ.AX.summary: Air New Zealand Limited provides passenger and cargo transportation services on scheduled airlines primarily in New Zealand, Australia, the Pacific Islands, the United Kingdom, Europe, Asia, and the United States. The company also offers ground handling services; engineering and maintenance services, including aircraft and component maintenance, repair, and overhaul services; and aircraft leasing and financing services. It operates a fleet of 114 aircraft. The company was formerly known as Tasman Empire Airways Limited and changed its name to Air New Zealand Limited in April 1965. Air New Zealand Limited was founded in 1940 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

Air New Zealand Limited was founded in 1940 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

The Aeronautical segment offers services that facilitate the movement of aircraft, passengers, and cargo, as well as utility services, which support the airport; and leases space for facilities, such as terminals. The Retail segment provides services to the retailers within the terminals; and car parking facilities for passengers, visitors, and airport staff. The Property segment leases cargo buildings, hangars, and stand-alone investment properties. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Manukau, New Zealand.

BZU.F.summary: Air New Zealand Limited provides passenger and cargo transportation services on scheduled airlines primarily in New Zealand, Australia, the Pacific Islands, the United Kingdom, Europe, Asia, and the United States. The company also offers ground handling services; engineering and maintenance services, including aircraft and component maintenance, repair, and overhaul services; and aircraft leasing and financing services. It operates a fleet of 114 aircraft. The company was formerly known as Tasman Empire Airways Limited and changed its name to Air New Zealand Limited in April 1965. Air New Zealand Limited was founded in 1940 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

MFT.NZ.summary: Mainfreight Limited provides supply chain logistics solutions in New Zealand, Australia, the Americas, Asia, and Europe. It provides warehousing, domestic freight forwarding, and international air and ocean freight forwarding services. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

MHM.NZ.summary: MHM Automation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs and supplies automated systems and equipment for the food processing and logistics sectors in New Zealand and Australia. The company designs and fabricates stainless steel and associated equipment for industrial, dairy, wine, and food sectors; and sells and services specialized food cutting equipment. It also designs, manufactures, delivers, and services automated handling systems primarily for the food sector; and designs, manufactures, and installs chilling and freezing tunnels, and plate freezing systems to the food industry, as well as offers related services, spare parts, and support. In addition, the company develops and commercializes S-clave, a patented system for the sterilization of medical equipment in a non-porous container system. The company was formerly known as Mercer Group Limited. MHM Automation Limited was founded in 1884 and is based in Christchurch, New Zealand.

MMH.NZ.summary: Marsden Maritime Holdings Limited operates a deep water port facility in the Greater Marsden Point Area, New Zealand. The company operates through three segments: Port Related Operations, Property Holdings, and Marina and Commercial. It also provides 185 hectares of industrial land for lease; operates farmland at Marsden Point; and owns and operates the Marsden Cove marina complex, which consists of a 229 berth marina, commercial complex, and boatyard facility. The company was formerly known as Northland Port Corporation (NZ) Limited and changed its name to Marsden Maritime Holdings Limited in August 2014. Marsden Maritime Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Ruakaka, New Zealand.

MPP.AX.summary: Metro Performance Glass Limited, together with its subsidiaries, supplies processed flat glass and related products for the residential and commercial building sectors in New Zealand and Australia. Its glass products include splashbacks, benchtops, and kitchen doors and mirrors; and bathroom mirrors, inline showers, two and three sided showers, bath end showers, bath screens, shower linings, and shower and screen hardware. The company also offers interior balustrades, stairs and floors, room dividers, mirrors, wall linings, doors, and furniture; and exterior balustrades, pool fences, wind breaks, glass canopies, glass features, outdoor furniture, and balustrade and pool fence hardware. In addition, it provides installation services. Metro Performance Glass Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

NPH.NZ.summary: Napier Port Holdings Limited provides various port services in the Napier Port. It offers marine, general cargo, container, port pack, and depot services. The company was founded in 1875 and is based in Napier, New Zealand. Napier Port Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Hawke's Bay Regional Investment Company Limited.

PGW.NZ.summary: PGG Wrightson Limited provides goods and services for agricultural sector in New Zealand. The company operates in two segments, Agency, and Retail & Water. It operates rural supplies stores that offer a range of products in various categories, such as fencing, agricultural chemicals, animal health, animal equipment and handling, clothing, fertilizer, home and garden, machinery, animal feed and nutrition, seeds, water and irrigation, horticulture, pet supplies, safety equipment, and dairy shed supplies. The company also provides agency services for the sale, purchase, and service of livestock through auction, private and on-farm sales, and online trading of livestock; irrigation and water services to farmers and horticulturists; and markets and exports wool products. In addition, it offers insurance products; fruit fed supplies; and rural supplies, as well as farm maintenance, soil and crop nutrition, and plant and soil testing. Further, the company provides real estate services, including rural, lifestyle, residential, and commercial properties. PGG Wrightson Limited was founded in 1841 and is based in Christchurch, New Zealand.

POT.NZ.short_name: Port of Tauranga Ltd Ordinary S
POT.NZ.summary: Port of Tauranga Limited, a port company, provides and manages port services and cargo handling facilities through the Port of Tauranga and MetroPort in New Zealand. It operates through three segments: Port Operations, Property Services, and Marshalling Services. The company also manages and maintains various port properties. In addition, it provides contracted terminal operations, stevedoring, marshalling, and scaling activities. Further, the company provides wharf facilities; and berthage, cranes, tugs, and pilot services, as well as offers services for the storage and transit of import and export cargo. The company was founded in 1873 and is based in Tauranga, New Zealand. Port of Tauranga Limited is a subsidiary of Quayside Securities Limited.

QEX.NZ.summary: QEX Logistics Limited operates as a cross-border logistics company that delivers products from New Zealand and Australian stores and online sites to individual consumers in China. The company offers import and export declaration/customs clearance, air/sea transportation, local 3PL / 4PL storage, inventory management, packing and sorting, and landing and distribution services in New Zealand; warehouse management, door-to-door pick-up and delivery services, supply chain optimization, product and market research, and in-depth international logistics services in Australia; and international logistics, bonded warehouse, and customs clearance and distribution services in China. It delivers milk powder and health supplements. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

RAK.NZ.summary: Rakon Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells frequency control products for various applications in Asia, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company provides crystal resonators, tuning fork crystals, standard SMD crystals, crystal oscillators, voltage control crystal oscillators and clock oscillators, temperature compensated crystal oscillators, oven controlled crystal oscillators, and oven controlled surface acoustic wave (SAW) oscillators. It also offers a range of crystal filters, including bandpass filters, notch/stop band filters, linear phase or constant group delay filters, phase and/or amplitude matching filters, and monolithic filters; and frequency multipliers. The company's products are used in telecommunications, global positioning, and space and defense, and other markets. In addition, it is involved in the provision of financing and marketing support services; and research and development activities. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

SKL.NZ.summary: Skellerup Holdings Limited manufactures, markets, and distributes technical polymer and elastomer products for various specialist industrial and agricultural applications. It operates through Agri and Industrial segments. The company offers food grade dairy rubberware, including liners and tubing products, and rubber footwear for agricultural applications; milk filters; milk liners, tubing, and accessories; feeding teats; dairy vacuum pumps; and dairy hygiene and livestock health management products, as well as mastitis prevention and mastitis detection equipment. It also provides sealing and waterproofing products for roofing, plumbing, and civil/underground applications; pipe seals, diaphragms, washers, gaskets, customized rubber moldings, check valves, O rings, disks, and other components for use in automotive, industrial, mining pipe, valve, and medical industries; high precision rubber and plastic components for the automotive, flow control, appliance, and industrial markets; and fabric reinforced diaphragms, and rubber metal seat valves and injector components. In addition, the company offers EVA, PE, and various blended foams for marine, sports, leisure, orthotic, and construction applications; foam and soft material products; and live wall systems for installation in new and existing chutes. It operates primarily in New Zealand, Australia, North America, the United Kingdom, Ireland, rest of Europe, Asia, and internationally. Skellerup Holdings Limited was founded in 1910 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

SMW.NZ.summary: SMW Group Limited operates in mining, engineering, and construction services sector. It provides diversified mining support and industry services; and specialized mining support services, mineral processing equipment, and solar power to the mining and construction industries. The company is based in Wellington, New Zealand.

STG.AX.summary: Straker Translations Limited engages in the provision of translation services in Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and North America. The company operates RAY, a cloud-based translation platform that creates a first draft translation and matching the customer's content with one or more of the approximately 13,000 crowd-sourced human freelance translators for refinement. It offers corporate and business translation services, such as e-commerce translation, financial translation, human resources translation, legal document translation, marketing content translation, medical document translation, technical document translation, Website translation, audio and video translation, and document translation services, as well as desktop publishing services. The company also provides language translation services; machine translation services; immigration, legal, and ECFMG translation services; birth, death, and marriage certificates translation services; and passports, visa, driving licenses, cv's, personal and private, police, academic records and transcripts, insurance, and other document translation services, as well as translation automation solutions comprising API translation solutions. Its platform supports African, Asian, Eastern European, European, Indian, Middle Eastern, and other languages. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.
